comment._content: REMARKABLE to have a photo of "Uncle Bill", a congressman, when he was 107 years old! HE LIVED TO 107 !!! THAT's INCREDIBLE !

comment.author: 15934026@N00
comment._content: Actually, if he was born in 1848 and died in 1957 he was 109 years old, not 107!

comment.author: 53209705@N07
comment._content: Oops, forgive me, thk u for the correct "2 added yrs. of his life" LIVING TO "109" ~ REMARKABLE !!! God blessed him with such a full & extended LIFE !!! [I may have been extremely sleepy when I made that mathematical mistake].

comment._content: Yes, some people are really lucky!

comment._content: Am I missing something here?  I don't think that "Uncle Bill" was a congressman.  The guy he's shaking hands with is the congressman.
